content.p: In compliance with regulations imposed by the Malaysian Ministry of Higher Education, all international students who are applying for a student pass and are planning to study at any higher education institution in Malaysia are required to undergo a Health Examination without exception. All international students are also required to obtain Medical and Health Insurance. This includes all international students applying for a student pass. For further information regarding health examinations and insurance please contact: Ms. Rita Vengidesan, International Student Support Officer Minor health problems can be dealt with by the University Health Centre located on the first floor of the Student Association(SA) Building (Block H1) A fee will be charged for consultation. For a fee the Health Centre also dispenses medicine and arranges for laboratory tests Opening hours: telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8778 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8005
